trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around August 14th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the phone with my old buddy Bernie from high school. We were speaking of the good times back in high school. I was sitting on my back porch while he was talking to me. I was looking up at the sky in between the tree lines towards union st. I saw a small piece of cloud sitting there and thought it was kind of strange. I continue my conversation with my friend and he started yapping on the phone. i was looking up and saw a plane or jet go above the the piece of cloud and then it completely disappeared? I guess it was not a piece of the sky? Very strange for me to be looking right up at what I thought was apiece of cloud then in takes off or something and disappears? any Ideas?
